# MPSRNNBidirectionalCombineMode.concatenate

**Case**

A mode in which two sequences are concatenated along the feature channels to form a single output.

## Declaration

```swift
case concatenate
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MPSRNNBidirectionalCombineMode.add**: A mode in which two sequences are summed to form a single output.
- **MPSRNNBidirectionalCombineMode.none**: A mode in which two sequences are kept separate.
